description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. A life of crime leads to life in jail, and that is exactly where Wilson Cooper starts his day. Only this day is different, this day he is going to break out. Unfortunately he is not a smart man, guide him out of jail and into a rock solid life. LONG LIVE GLORIOUS NATION LIBYA.
description.short: A life of crime leads to life in jail, and that is exactly where Wilson Cooper starts his day. Only this day is different, this day he is going to break out. Unfortunately he is not a smart man, guide him out of jail and into a rock solid life. LONG LIVE GLORIOUS NATION LIBYA.
